name: Book of Ani VR Tomb Explorer
name_original: Book of Ani VR Tomb Explorer
description:
An edu-tech adventure game that covers the events described in the British Museum's papyrus of Ani.

- Controls - 

Left Motion Controller Thumbstick -> Move

Motion Controller Grip buttons -> Grab object / pull lever

All assets are original except for the three  photoscanned egyptian artifacts found at the end of the game.

WARNING: This experience is only playable with a VR headset.
